programme.title: CNY - Super Ethnic Chinese (M) Ep1
programme.desc: Prepare for an epic showdown as the most formidable Golden Bell hosts form three teams, leading a battle royale featuring top-tier artists. Watch as they unleash their talents in a full-scale competition of wit and strength. Brace yourself for laughter in this Lunar New Year!

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the public housing estate where he grew up, not to visit his aging father, but to seek refuge after his business has failed. When his family of five squeeze into the small estate unit, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiance Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mus lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Lis father

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.desc: Tamil crime thriller film, Starring, Arun Vijay, Mahima Nambiar, Thambi Ramaiah, Vamsi Krishna, Vijayakumar & Others

programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma
programme.desc: the adventures of Tapu and the Gokuldham Co-operative Housing Society, and if something wrong happens, Tapu and his friends solve the problems. Problems like robbery, fights or kidnapping are seen to be solved.

programme.title: Hagola
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Honey Bunny & The Spy Eagle
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Hancock

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 5
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys say all the wrong things when conducting sensitivity training, have unexpected celebrity sightings on the street, and are forced into being unreceptive receptionists in a busy office.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys share shameful secrets in the park, don headsets at a fast food drive-through, and try to convince unsuspecting strangers to dance with them.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 7
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys enlist shoppers to settle senseless debates in the mall, scream for ice-cream as patrons in a parlor, and protest unconventional causes in the park.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys debut uninspiring inventions to stunned focus groups, use people for pillows as they fall asleep in the park, and talk shoppers out of their desired products in a grocery store.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 9
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys search for imaginary places with a little help from strangers, pick their own poison in the park, and there's a surprise behind every door in the horrifyinghunt for a house-sitter.

programme.title: Friends S4 15
programme.desc: Chandler's annoying former girlfriend reappears. Ross plays rugby to impress Emily with painful results.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: A father finds himself unemployed and decides to turn his home into a day care.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

Academy Award Winner Kevin Spacey and young Hollywood super star Kate Boswoth star in this clever & adreniline filled heist film. An MIT math whiz is recruited by a teacher to join a specialized team of card counters.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazar in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Diggers - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey get special access to a factory that makes as many as a hundred iconic yellow diggers every single day.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Taiwanese pangolin travels through a land of giants to seek a mate, and in Brazil, a family of tamarins travel to the edge of their world to seek a new future alongside humans.

programme.desc: Bologna - Stanley Tucci explores Bologna, seen by many as the food capital of Italy. He breaks open a fresh cheese wheel with Massimo Bottura and meets the niece of Federico Fellini.

programme.desc: Joanna's epic journey comes to an end on the idyllic beaches of Kohama, one of Japan's most remote pacific islands - and home to a 'girl band' with an average age of 84.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep1
programme.desc: For The Love Of Tea - Tea is sustenance for mind, body and soul - the very lifeblood of humanity. The tribal De'ang people high in the mountains of Yunnan Province believe themselves to be literally made of tea.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Art Of Tea - Tea ceremonies of the past inform present day rituals - including a breath-taking outdoor tea ceremony for 100 people on the banks of a river in Taiwan. The skills and passion of the world famous Rock Tea producers are celebrated in a blind-tasting competition.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tea For The Soul - A lone monk is on his life's mission to recreate the tea cakes of famous sage Lu Yu from the early Tang Dynasty. In an austere nunnery near Wuhan, the nuns experience every stage of tea-making - from picking all the way through to drinking - as an act of prayerful meditation.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep4
programme.desc: To The Ends of the Earth - Starting on the treacherous Tea Horse Road stretching from southern China into Tibet, India and beyond. We discover the healing wonder of matcha tea in an ancient Japanese temple and hear about the extraordinary rescue of the forgotten Georgian tea gardens.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Tastes of the Tea Trade - Starting in the busy container port and tea centre of Dubai, a tea hub where millions of tonnes of tea are traded from east to west, we move in Fujian Province to witness the beautiful natural withering process of White Tea, increasing in popularity in China and around the world.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Tea Without Limits - This final episode is about a challenge: it is about visionary tea-makers throwing a gauntlet down, challenging humanity to change their tastes and habits - to step out into an exciting future.

programme.title: Chinese New Year: The Biggest Celebration on Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Migration - At the Harbin Ice and Snow Festival, the Chinese brave the cold, dive into frozen water and enjoy themselves at minus 30 degrees as they celebrate the New Year in an icy wonderland.

programme.title: Chinese New Year: The Biggest Celebration on Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Reunion - Hairy Bikers Dave and Si visit Beijing for the New Year, where the whole city comes to a halt as everyone gathers round dinner tables to tuck into the traditional reunion dinner.

programme.title: Chinese New Year: The Biggest Celebration on Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Celebration - Once the New Year celebrations are over, Kate trains with a top dragon-dancing troupe and Ant heads to the frozen north east to discover the ancient art of fishing there.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland - The Volcanic Highlands - The central highlands of Iceland are otherworldly. Situated at an altitude of approx. 450 meters above sea level, the region experiences some of the most inhospitable weather on the planet.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A record-breaking cyclone wrecks South Pacific islands, a cruise ship becomes stranded in a storm, and two friends get caught in a deadly avalanche.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Sri Lanka - Robson Green meets some of Sri Lanka's marine life, including sardines, mahseers, black jacks and mangrove jacks.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.desc: Buses - The red double-decker bus is a global icon. They carry millions of passengers every day across the capital, and Gregg Wallace has special access to a bus-building factory in Scarborough, Yorkshire.

programme.desc: Isle of Wight - Kate takes a trip down memory lane on a wintry walk around the western corner of the Isle of Wight, where she holidayed as a girl.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Taiwanese pangolin travels through a land of giants to seek a mate, and in Brazil, a family of tamarins travel to the edge of their world to seek a new future alongside humans.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Healthy Inside - Dr Michael Mosley tries to learn the secrets behind staying healthy. He examines ways that people can make their bodies better at fighting infection and sickness.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Defending Wild Dogs - The people going to extraordinary lengths to understand and protect canids, from preventing wild dogs dying of grief in South Africa to protecting the tiny Darwin's fox.

programme.title: Chinese New Year: The Biggest Celebration on Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Migration - At the Harbin Ice and Snow Festival, the Chinese brave the cold, dive into frozen water and enjoy themselves at minus 30 degrees as they celebrate the New Year in an icy wonderland.

programme.desc: Celebration - Once the New Year celebrations are over, Kate trains with a top dragon-dancing troupe and Ant heads to the frozen north east to discover the ancient art of fishing there.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ancestors - Michael Wood joins the Qin family reunion, when 300 relatives gather to worship their ancestors on Tomb Sweeping Day, before visiting some excavations at Erlitou.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Silk Roads and China Ships - In the backstreets and markets of Xi'an, Michael meets descendants of the traders from central Asia and Persia who came into China on the Silk Road.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Golden Age - In Twin Dragon Alley, in the city of Kaifeng, locals tell Michael him the legend of the baby boys who became emperors. He looks at China's most famous work of art - the Kaifeng scroll.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Ming - Michael Wood recounts the tale of one of China's most famous dynasties beginning with the amazing story of Hongwu, a peasant rebel who founded one of greatest eras in Chinese history.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Last Empire - China's last empire, the Qing, began in violence and war but Michael reveals how under the Qing, China doubled in size to include Xinjiang, Mongolia and Tibet.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Age of Revolution - Michael reveals how three cataclysmic revolutions between 1850 and 1950 shook China to the core. He ends his story with Mao's death and the boom time of the last thirty years.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Bologna - Stanley Tucci explores Bologna, seen by many as the food capital of Italy. He breaks open a fresh cheese wheel with Massimo Bottura and meets the niece of Federico Fellini.

programme.desc: Iceland - The Volcanic Highlands - The central highlands of Iceland are otherworldly. Situated at an altitude of approx. 450 meters above sea level, the region experiences some of the most inhospitable weather on the planet.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep3
programme.desc: On the Auroras - Alaskans confront the environment, and themselves, as winter bears down.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cool South - Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where theyre not welcome.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Creatures of the Night - Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundys surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the worlds fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Outbreak! - The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Winged Weirdos - One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Back from the Dead - Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ugly - Gawk at some of the worlds ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but theyre evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the worlds longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dilla and Delilah - The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Creepy Crawlers - Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Crocodiles - Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; theyre among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now theyre protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Pantanal - The Pantanal is one of the worlds great reservoirs for plant and animal life. Scientists estimate that its home to 80 species of mammals, 650 species of birds, 50 species of reptiles, and over 300 species of fish. Its the largest tropical wetland on Earth, yet its also one of the most unforgiving habitats to call home.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Remarkable Reptiles - Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. Theyve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Cold Blood - It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia theres a different story this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Turtle's Legacy - The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3

programme.title: Border Control: Europe S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. A Slippery Situation - In Algeciras, Spain, a clandestine eel hatchery is dismantled, and in Brussels, whitening creams containing illegal, carcinogenic ingredients are confiscated.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters S15 Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. Poltergeist Prison - TAPS face a flurry of unexplained activity at a prison-turned-whiskey distillery in North Carolina. The team tap into the facility's tragic past to find answers.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. Los Angeles - Bert Kreischer bungee jumps off the infamous "Bridge to Nowhere" in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. Upper Midwest - Bert Kreischer races machine-powered chariots against locals in the Upper Midwest.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Hunt For Extraterrestrials S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. Ancient Visitors - Josh's journey continues on remote Easter Island, where ancient alien theorists believe extraterrestrials visited a millennia ago.

programme.title: Portals To Hell S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. Lalaurie Mansion - Jack and Katrina perform the first-ever paranormal investigation of the infamous LaLaurie Mansion.

programme.title: Extreme Vacation Homes S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. Grenadines Italy Florida Keys The Hamptons - Explore unique holiday homes, from crazy ski chalets to heavenly Hamptons hideaways. And, meet the owners and architects behind the creations.

programme.title: Extreme Vacation Homes S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. Thailand Laguna Beach Washington And The Uk - Explore unique holiday homes, from crazy ski chalets to heavenly Hamptons hideaways. And, meet the owners and architects behind the creations.

programme.title: Airplane Repo S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. Armed And Airborne - The million-dollar repo men face menacing mechanics, dangerous swamps and 6 armed cops in their attempts to seize luxury planes.

programme.title: Cooper's Treasure S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. Into The Storm - A dangerous storm threatens to shut down the operation just as Darrell and team discover gold ore in the remains of an old wreck.

programme.title: Extreme Hotels S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. Mountain Marvels - Anthony Melchiorri visits four incredible mountain hotels in four countries across Europe. Each destination is more breathtaking than the last.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S2 Ep9

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep6

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.desc: The End is the Beginning - Honerva sets out to destroy everything and Team Voltrons only hope is to take her on one last time.

programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four - In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leader's goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep26
programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Five - It all comes down to this! With anti-goop in hand from the opposite dimension, Rocky and Bullwinkle set out to take away Fearless Leaders super powers and save the world.

programme.desc: Jump The Whale Shark / Frederic Bartholdi - When Sherman's friends crash the show for an impromptu beach party, he and his rival both do a trick jump over a whale shark to win over a girl

Twig and the others think the videos are instructions for living, but Berry feels like no one is listening to her.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep38
programme.desc: Sacred Cup / My Fair Berry - Wanting a better way to drink water, the MOs go on a quest for something previously unknown to them, a cup. / When flowers invite Berry to The Bloomers Ball, Twig, who has a personal vendetta against the flowers, teaches her to be a proper flower, in the hopes of showing them up.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep39
programme.desc: Trolling Through Iceland - When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Sukis prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his friend Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppys surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep30
programme.desc: The Muscle - When traveling to recruit the mighty Golem for their mission, Puss tries to prove that no one is better than him at being "the muscle" of the team.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep30
programme.desc: Galapagos a Go-Go - When Odlulu uses the Become an Animal Key to transform herself into different animals, she accidentally disrupts the Galapagos Islands animal populations. It's up to Wally, Wenda, Edmund and Hillary to protect the Galapagos from Odlulu's creature chaos.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Little Lost Toy - Smartysaurus is delighted because a little clockwork duck has appeared at the DinoLab. No one knows where she belongs but Noddy is sure that her family must be missing her so he decides to investigate and find her home. Noddy uses all his skills of thinking, looking, listening and asking questions to find the home for the little duck. Things aren't helped by the little duck constantly rushing back to the Dinolab! What is going on? Clever Noddy realises that the little duck is the missing duckling from the new family of ducks at the Calm Farm and soon reunites her with her Mummy and sister. And Smartysaurus is happy too because she can visit her new little friend whenever she wants! Quack, quack Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep7
programme.desc: Law And Order - Mr Carburettor is fed up with the cars running amok on his track and summons Bill and Nick to restore order to the track. But might our overzealous policeman overstep the mark?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of Jumpy Revs - Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep8
programme.desc: Flash's Tea Party - Flash invites everyone to a tea party, thinking they bring the food with them. Are there going to be a lot of hungry bunnies at Silver hatch?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14

programme.desc: In Plain Sight - Hiccup and his crew are in search for dragon eye gems only to discover a spy amongst them In the midst of it all Dagur has run into an old nemesis

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep66
programme.desc: Julien 2.0 - King Julien wants a doover to become King JULIEN 2.0 and actually listen to his people. But when everyone feels their voice is the most important the kingdom becomes a chaotic mess

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep2
programme.desc: From Days Long Ago - The Blue Lion delivers the team to an alien planet where they discover a mysterious castle. Inside, they awaken an alien princess who sends them on a mission to find the remaining lions.
