programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Night at the Bluseum - It's the night of the big Bluseum opening, and just as Josh unveils Blue's masterpiece, he discovers that it's missing! He must play Blue's Clues to crack this caper and get Blue's painting back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Sandcastle Calamity / Owl-Ert - Steel upsets a family of sand crabs when he makes a huge sandcastle for Stu and Safia. // Kai rushes through a voice-recognition upgrade on Janice and she ends up mistaking the hoots of a baby owl as commands from Alex, making his gadgets go crazy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington Needs a Hero - Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day / The Way of the Gran-Gran / The Spring Kick-off Games - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master. // Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show - Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. // Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Trouble with Bunny Slugs / Life with Chumby - When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Caracol Cove - Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep6

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After 67 Days, Alone Australia has its inaugural winner. The Reunion brings the 10 participants together again to relive key moments, share unseen footage and reflect on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: Project Wild Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time Ann explores the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: Planet America Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Are we headed for a repeat of the 2020 Election between Trump and Biden in 2024? Wars in Gaza and Ukraine, the economy, unemployment, the border, abortion, law and order, healthcare and legal disputes could decide the result.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Melbourne Chef and restaurateur Dan Zeidan lost his home in the Black Saturday bushfires in 2009. He and his partner Vicky set out to re-build a totally flame proof and fully sustainable home in Kinglake.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: The World Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Adam and Poh are heading to Tasmania on a quest to put together a not-so humble version of a classic Aussie Pie. They'll even attempt to answer the most controversial question of all... Do you want sauce with that?

programme.title: Back Roads Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Back Roads heads to north Queensland sugar cane country and the town of Home Hill. Presenter Heather Ewart discovers the heartwarming, and at times heartbreaking, stories of the families that first came here to cut cane.

programme.title: Indonesia Decides Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Indonesians are voting for their next president, and for the first time more than half the electorate is under 40. ABC travels to Indonesia to hear what younger voters think about the key challenges facing the nation. (Final)

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Black Snow Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rumours and gossip are spreading around Ashford and suspicion is cast over Joe. Cormack continues to interview the 'time capsule kids' and more secrets rise to the surface.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Melbourne Chef and restaurateur Dan Zeidan lost his home in the Black Saturday bushfires in 2009. He and his partner Vicky set out to re-build a totally flame proof and fully sustainable home in Kinglake.

programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Jerry Coleby-Williams explores a restored mangrove wetland, Costa Georgiadis visits a wheat farm, Tino Carnevale meets a gardener just shy of 100 and we meet a creative duo capturing plants in stunning detail.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: Rev
programme.desc: Are classic cars better for the environment than EVs? - The production of a car has a major environmental impact. Building a modern electric car, for example, produces 26 tons of CO2 emissions. By the time a classic car could emit this amount of pollutants, its owner could theoretically drive it for an average of 2000km a year, for 46 years. But still, classic cars seem to be on the brink of extinction.

programme.title: In Good Shape
programme.desc: The Health Show - Tooth decay, diabetes, heart disease, cancer, joint pain...A scientific review of studies says a whopping 45 negative health outcomes can come from eating too much sugar! But how much is too much? And how can we wean ourselves off the sweet stuff?

programme.desc: We go out onto a river where pleasure seekers take in an aquatics show. At first glance a display of rag-tag theatricality, the perform-ers are actually practicing a centuries-old form of swimming.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions(28Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time, body fat percentage scales and luggage rack mirrors.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Konnyaku is an important ingredient in Japanese cuisine. It offers various health benefits, and is drawing international attention. We learn how it is processed, and new ways in which it is used.

programme.desc: Eleven years ago, a section of the JR Tadami Line closed due to heavy rain. On October 2022, the line resumed full operation. See how the locals overcame the challenges to bring back the Tadami Line.

programme.title: Okinawa: The Holiest Place

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.
